name: death standing 2
description:
made in the worlds most innovative and complex video-game creating tool. the games factory two.

WASD to move, Q and E to shift balance (if you fall over, spam the direction opposite of the one you fell in). space to deploy BB and interact with terminal (idk why but u have to be facing only 4 cardinal directions to deploy and undeploy bb)

As for why i made this masterpiece:

For school this year i was going to take AP Psych, which is a one-semester class. I didn't want to do AP sociology, so i got stuck with videogame design. this was my final project, ive created the sequel (and spiritual successor) to death stranding, and succesfully created the second strand-type game.
